markdownRemark.html:
There are a lot of problems in Philippines that I think should be addressed in the next five years to ten years.

  • Traffic eating up Manila’s productivity. It is estimated that we lose 3.5 billion pesos (66 million USD) DAILY.

  • Degredation of natural resources is taking its toll and already affecting human lives. Soil erosion killed 90 people and others missing in two separate locations in a span of a week.

  • A 2016 study shows that as a country, we are producing students incapable of adopting to the future.

Google, Apple and other companies have already declared that they don’t need a degree for certain professions to hire.
